A cordiall for Christians in the time of affliction. Or, A sermon preached at Kethering Lecture by Master Robert Bolton, Bachelour of Divinity, and sometimes fellow of Brasen-nose Colledge in Oxford. Published by I.S. Bolton, Robert, 1572-1631. I. S.
[8], 27, [1] p.
Printed by George Miller dwelling in the Blacke-Fryers, London : MDCXL. [1640]
Sometimes bound as part of STC 3245 and consequently as part of Wing B3512. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

[8], 27, [1] p.
Printed by George Miller dwelling in the Blacke-Fryers, London : MDCXL. [1640]
Sometimes bound as part of STC 3245 and consequently as part of Wing B3512. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
